key_themes: Technical breakdown risk and deleveraging pressure
Institutional crypto adoption vs retail sentiment divergence
Regulatory tightening in banking and fintech
Options dealer hedging creating resistance at call walls
risk_factors: BoJ $500B+ ETF liquidation execution could trigger forced selling
Bitcoin breakdown below $125 support triggering crypto deleveraging cascade
QQQ and Ethereum technical support breaks confirmed by multiple sources
Corporate earnings guidance cuts spreading beyond software sector
Retail-institutional sentiment divergence (71% Twitter bullish vs structural bearish evidence) suggesting potential capitulation ahead
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $680 immediate support (5k OI), $690 resistance (7k OI). QQQ: $610 put wall support (6k OI), testing breakdown risk. Watch for breakdown acceleration if SPY loses $680
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $670 major put wall support (13k OI), $695 call wall resistance (7k OI). QQQ: $610 support critical, $625 max pain gravitational pull, $635-640 resistance zone (6k OI each). Bitcoin $125 support per Twitter - breakdown triggers deleveraging
